page.title: 02A DAY IN DORCAN E.SWINDON
page.content: {Monday.}Normally I get up at 7.30 A.M. and have breakfast (3 Weetabix and a glass of milk) with my family.I then leave for {school}.When I get to school my first two lessons are maths tutorial.Then we have break,at break- timeI play football.Then my next two lessons are maths and music,at 11.30 A.M.I go home for lunch.After lunch my lessons are English,French,English. In English at the moment we are writing a lot of stories.At 3.00 P.M.the whole school goes home,when I get home I do my {paper round}.Then I watch T.V.for a while,then I go out and play football.When I get in I have something to eat,then at 9.30 P.M.I go to bed and read. A DAY IN THE LIFE AT DORCAN SCHOOL
